page.title: 18Worlingworth School Memories
page.content: Over the past 40 years Worlingworth school has changed from grit & dirt playground to asphalt,outside toilets to flush type indoor ones,open fires to central heating & from an age range of 5 to 15 years to 5 to 11 years.The numbers of pupils & staff have reduced considerably.The amount & variety of equipment has increased as has the range of activities.A swimming pool & a micro-computer are now in use.In the past most children walked to school, 1.25 miles was common.Now children arrive by car or cycle in good weather. The golden age of the school may have been 12 years ago when we had more pupils & a new head improved facilities.For the future we would expect fewer children & amalgamation with other schools.
